title: Captives of care
subject_group: Literature/Australian literature - Film and video adaptations

description: A dramatic reconstruction of events which occurred at "Leumah", a residential institution for physically handicapped adults, during 1973. Tells of the residents' struggle to gain a measure of autonomy, and the obstacles which were put in their way. Adapted from the book "Captives of Care" by John Roarty. Cast includes: Julieanne Newbould, Pat Thomson, Kay Taylor, Phillip Hinton, Tony Ward and John Roarty.
